config.unfreeze-time-always.name: Always Unfreeze Time
config.unfreeze-time-always.tooltip: If true, menus never pause time.
config.unfreeze-time-while-fishing.name: Unfreeze While Fishing
config.unfreeze-time-while-fishing.toolt: If true, time stays unpaused only while fishing.
config.close-on-fish-bite.name: Close Inventory on Fish Bite
config.close-on-fish-bite.tooltip: Automatically closes menus when a fish bites.
config.debug-logging.name: Enable Debug Logging
config.debug-logging.tooltip: Logs detailed state updates for testing.
